Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.cli

Class SantoriniMap

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.cli.SantoriniMap
public class SantoriniMap
extends java.lang.Object
Class that define and implements the visualisation of the board and an external (safety) access to the single tiles that compose the board
Since:
2020/06/18

      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • SantoriniMap

      public SantoriniMap()
      Method that handle the initialization of coordinate value of single tiles and add them all to available tiles. This model adopt this choice: tileNumber correspond to an index of the array Tile[] that contain all the board's tiles

  • Method Details

    • printMap

      public void printMap()
      Method that handle the visualisation of the board using strings contained in the corresponding tiles

    • printRawTileInfo

      private void printRawTileInfo​(int x)
      Method used to print raws of a tile with or without player/building
      Parameters:
      x - Int value represents coordinate x of the tile to print

    • printInternalTileInfo

      private void printInternalTileInfo​(int x, int raw)
      Method used to print a single raw of a tile with or without player/building
      Parameters:
      x - Int value represents coordinate x of the tile to print
      raw - Int value represents which raw is to print

    • printAvailableTiles

      public void printAvailableTiles()
      Method that handle the visualisation of a list of available tiles

    • setBlueBackgroundColor

      public java.lang.String setBlueBackgroundColor​(java.lang.String string)
      Method that set a blue background to the board
      Parameters:
      string - String value to which this method applies the blue background color
      Returns:
      backgroundString String value with the blue background

    • setSelectedTile

      public void setSelectedTile​(int tileNumber, boolean selected)
      Method that set selected boolean value to tile number identified by tile number. This implies the set of the selected background color on this tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile number that we want to set as selected
      selected - Boolean value (true = tile is selected / false = tile is not selected)

    • setTileHasPlayer

      public void setTileHasPlayer​(boolean hasPlayer, int tileNumber, Color playerColor)
      Method that handle the setting of a worker or a player (with corresponding worker color) in a tile
      Parameters:
      hasPlayer - Boolean value that represent if the tile has or hasn't the player (== false if to remove worker)
      tileNumber - Tile number user want to modify
      playerColor - Color of the player whose worker we want to set in this tile (== null if to remove worker)

    • checkOccupiedTile

      public boolean checkOccupiedTile​(int tileNumber)
      Method to check if a tile is or isn't occupied by another worker
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile number to control
      Returns:
      occupied Boolean value (true = occupied / false = unoccupied)

    • getPlayerColorFromTile

      public Color getPlayerColorFromTile​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to get color of the player in the tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile to control
      Returns:
      color Color of the player occupying the cell

    • updateStringBoardBuilding

      public void updateStringBoardBuilding​(Building buildingType, int tileNumber)
      Method that update the strings corresponding to a tile with the corresponding building type
      Parameters:
      buildingType - Type of the building of the tile
      tileNumber - Tile number to update type of building

    • updateStringBoardBuilding

      public void updateStringBoardBuilding​(Square squareToModify)
      Same of the previous method but in this case all info are contained in a Square (from Server)
      Parameters:
      squareToModify - Square with necessary info to update building type of the corresponding tile (to update corresponding tile' strings)

    • getTileFromCoordinate

      public int getTileFromCoordinate​(int x, int y)
      Method used to get a tile number from corresponding coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - Coordinate X int value
      y - Coordinate Y int value
      Returns:
      tileNumber

    • getCoordinatesFromTile

      public int[] getCoordinatesFromTile​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to get coordinates from a tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile whose coordinate this method get
      Returns:
      coordinate[] An array of int containing coordinate[0] = coordinate X | coordinate[1] = coordinate Y

    • getAvailableTiles

      public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableTiles()
      Method to get available tiles
      Returns:
      availableTile List of Integer of the available tiles of the current map

    • resetAvailableTiles

      public void resetAvailableTiles()
      Method used to reset the list of available tiles of the current map

    • resetTileBackground

      public void resetTileBackground​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to reset the background of a tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile number of the tile to reset the background

    • iterateOnRawOfTile

      private void iterateOnRawOfTile​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to iterate on the raws of a tile. Every tile is composed by 7 raws which are used to print the correct tile representation
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile number of the tile on which iterate

    • setAvailableTiles

      public void setAvailableTiles​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> availableTiles)
      Method used to set available tiles
      Parameters:
      availableTiles - List of available tile to set

    • setAvailableTilesBackground

      private void setAvailableTilesBackground​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> availableTiles)
      Methd to set the correct background of available tile
      Parameters:
      availableTiles - List of available tiles on which set the "available" background

    • setPlaceWorkerNotAvailableTiles

      public void setPlaceWorkerNotAvailableTiles​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> modifiedTiles)
      Method used by Cli.PlaceWorker to set modified tiles as not available
      Parameters:
      modifiedTiles - List of tiles in which current player has placed his workers

    • getAvailableBuildingFromTile

      public Building getAvailableBuildingFromTile​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to get available building from a tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile whose available building is asked
      Returns:
      availableBuilding Building that is available in the tile

    • getTileBuilding

      public Building getTileBuilding​(int tileNumber)
      Method used to get the current building of a tile
      Parameters:
      tileNumber - Tile number whose current building is asked
      Returns:
      currentBuilding Building currently present on the tile
